Posts.Content: Many thanks have taken a note of the test you recommend.
Posts.Title: Heart disease and cancer

Posts.Content: Really helpful as i already have to deal with atrial fibulation. I will print out your reply when i go for any consultations. Some concerns as i have found out that there is not a cardiologist on the group that dicussies my care plan and when i suggested a cardio oncologist to the nurse they seemed to not have met the idea. I will certainly bring these concerns up with the consultant but at the moment waiting for path results from surgery. Many thanks.
Posts.Title: Heart disease and cancer

Posts.Content: I have had a triple bypass, 1. Graft failed so had to have more stents and after further heart attacks on medication and relatively stable. Have atrial fibulation. Now diagnosed with lobular breast cancer. Had full mastectomy and lymph node clearance. On letrosole because er pos pr pos her neg. does anyone know how this will affect chemo or rad treatment if i am offered it. I see the surgeon on thursday for pathology results.
